desc: Basilur Tea brings you premium Ceylon Tea in sophisticated and timeless designs! Basilur Tea promises you a perfect and thoughtful gift for any occasion, and the finest cup of tea every time! The finest Ceylon Black Tea, Ceylon Green Tea, and a range of tea gifts ideal for any occasion!

layout.text: Refresh and revitalise with Basilur's Summer Collection!
Summer is one of our favourite seasons and we are bringing you a collection of the finest Ceylon Tea to keep you cool and refreshed all Summer long!
